terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Welcome to Human Translator. By using our app, you agree to these terms, which ensure a fair and productive environment for all users. Our services are designed to connect travelers with translators in real-time, facilitate communication, and provide cultural guidance. Users must be at least 18 years old and provide accurate information. Translators must have proficiency in the languages they offer. All users must respect others and follow local laws. We protect your data according to our Privacy Policy. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: At Human Translator, we take your privacy seriously. We collect personal information such as phone numbers and location data only to provide our translation services. Your conversations are encrypted and not stored permanently unless requested for quality purposes. We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. We do not sell your information to third parties. You can access, modify, or delete your data at any time through the app settings. By using our services, you consent to this policy. If you have questions about your privacy, please contact our support team.
